Criminal_Court_of_Appeal_definition: Any person who has lost the court case, partly or fully, before the first instance court, may appeal before the Court of appeal.
court_of_appeal_violations: The Court of Appeal considers the appeal of the judgments issued by the Criminal Single Judge in the cases of violations, provided that they shall be on:
court_of_appeal_misdemeanors: The Court of Appeal considers the appeal of all judgments issued by the Criminal Single Judge in the cases of misdemeanors, provided that they shall have been settled in the merits of the dispute.
appeal_of_judgment_1: Imprisonment, preventive detention or a fine of more than five hundred thousand Lebanese pounds.
appeal_of_judgment_2: Additional or secondary penalty or personal compensations of more than five hundred thousand Lebanese pounds.
appeal_of_judgment_3: Revocation of defense stipulated in Article 73 of the Criminal Procedures Code.
appeal_of_judgment_4: Penalty for a violation correlative with a misdemeanor.
exceptions_1: The appeal of decisions that settle one or more of the formal defenses stipulated in Article 73 of the Criminal Procedures Code shall be accepted.
exceptions_2: Decisions by which the Single Judge terminates the lawsuit without addressing its subject matter.
exceptions_3: Decisions issued on accepting or revoking the release requests.
Court_of_Appeal_is_entitled: The Court of Appeal is entitled, when exercising its tasks, to listen to witnesses, interrogate the parties of the lawsuit, invite new witnesses, appoint an expert, listen to experts and carry out any new investigations it deems appropriate...
court_appeal_number: Within every governorate, there is one or more courts of appeal.
The_court_of_appeal_consists: The Court of Appeal consists of 3 judges:
Decision_on_revoking: Decision on revoking or accepting the defenses stated in Article 73 of the Criminal Procedures Code:
Decisions_of_the_Court_of_Appeal: Decisions of the Court of Appeal:
Final_Judgements_1: With respect to plaintiff, defendant, responsible for money, and guarantor
Final_Judgements_1_task1: As of the date of its issuance if it is made in presentia.
Final_Judgements_1_task2: As of the date of being notified whether it is made in presentia or absentia.
Final_Judgements_2: With respect to the Appellate Public Prosecutor
Final_Judgements_2_task1: As of the date of issuance of the judgment.
Final_Judgements_3: With respect to the Appellate Public Prosecution
Final_Judgements_3_task1: As of the date of issuance of the judgment.
With_respect_to_the_Public_Prosecution: With respect to the Public Prosecution
As_of_the_date_of_issuance_of_the_decisi: As of the date of issuance of the decision.
As_of_the_date_of_notifying_the_opponent: As of the date of notifying the opponents of the same.
The_appeal_shall_be_submitted_through_a_: The appeal shall be submitted through a lawyer.
